page.title: 02Farming around Park Cross.
page.content: There are{fifteen working farms} within the survey area and one { {horticultural}nursery. Most of the farms are livestock, keeping mostly dairy and beef cattle with a small number of sheep.The major crop is grass, but a number of the livestock farms also grow some cereal.There is one large arable farm. The market used by most farmers is Salisbury.On the Forest Road there are the premises of Watson and Haig,{agricultural {engineers,}who repair and supply tractors and other agricultural machinery.Two of the farms in the same area are{agricultural contractors}who undertake work on behalf of other farmers. Also nearby at Park Green Farm there is the only licensed {slaughterhouse}on the Isle of Wight supplying meat for pets and hides.
